price: Kuma wãne ne ya fi kyau ga addini daga wanda ya sallama fuskarsa ga Allah, alhãli kuwa yanã mai kyautatawa kuma ya bi aƙidar Ibrãhĩm, Yanã mai karkata zuwa ga gaskiya? Allah Yã riƙi Ibrãhĩm badãɗayi.*
arabic: وَمَنۡ أَحۡسَنُ دِينٗا مِّمَّنۡ أَسۡلَمَ وَجۡهَهُۥ لِلَّهِ وَهُوَ مُحۡسِنٞ وَٱتَّبَعَ مِلَّةَ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ حَنِيفٗاۗ وَٱتَّخَذَ ٱللَّهُ إِبۡرَٰهِيمَ خَلِيلٗا
footnotes: * Akwai kwaɗaitarwa ga cewa, wanda yake son Allah Ya so shi, to sai ya bi aƙĩda da aiki irin na Ibrãhĩma, sai Allah Ya so shi.

version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
